about_the_game:
A sad sound rang out and that was when the game began
. Time is a vicious cycle, every day we wake up and have to welcome a new emotion and different situations happen in life, whether we like it or not, we still have to continue. Let's explore a day in the life of an ordinary person and experience the game in your own way.

Thank you for being a part of this life.

Hopefully this game of ours can bring back some emotions that may not be strong but at least leave something in you.

About gameplay:
In Melan, the player as An will go everywhere and collect memories, thereby revealing some of what is happening in the game. At the same time, interacting and exchanging with other characters will help players partly understand what An is going through.

The game is built in a storytelling format with situations that the player gradually discovers through interacting with the environment and NPCs.
What's in Melan?
- Map and Pixel art system created by Nera
- Explore An's journeys on the road to finding memories through interacting with objects and the environment
- Experience emotions through character interactions
- NPC system and diverse storyline
- And some additional elements in the future...

content_descriptors.notes: The game has some words that refer to problems, suicide, and depression
